keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Alexanda Kotey, 32, is said to have been part of a group led by the Islamic State’s most infamous executioner, Mohammed Emwazi, better known as Jihadi John.

headline.print_headline: ISIS Member Who Took Part in Beheadings of Hostages Is Reportedly Identified
headline.main: Member of ISIS Group Led by ‘Jihadi John’ Is Reportedly Identified

snippet: Alexanda Kotey, 32, is said to have been part of a group led by the Islamic State’s most infamous executioner, Mohammed Emwazi, better known as Jihadi John.
abstract: BuzzFeed and Washington Post report Alexanda Kotey was identified as member of faction within Islamic State group responsible for beheadings of American journalists James Foley and Steven J Sotloff, as well as other Western hostages in Syria; small inner group monikered Beatles was led by London resident Mohammed Emwazi, notorious executioner also known as Jihadi John; American and British officials have not confirmed reports.
